metadata.title: CVE-2016-6255 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
Portable UPnP SDK (aka libupnp) before 1.6.21 allows remote attackers towrite to arbitrary files in the webroot via a POST request without aregistered handler.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libupnp6 - 1:1.6.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libupnp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.6.22-1').
